verbose_text: Real-time PCR showed similar expressions of PAX6 (XREF_FIG), MAP2 (XREF_FIG), and GFAP (XREF_FIG) in KNL1 c.6125G> A neural spheroids containing KNL1 cDNA compared to wild-type neural spheroids, demonstrating that wild-type KNL1 expression is sufficient to rescue the size difference and prevent premature differentiation.
evidence: KNL1 expression is sufficient to rescue the size difference and prevent premature differentiation
